OEM Commercial Licenses =======================
For OEMs, ISVs, and VARs who distribute products derived from OpenAMQ, and do not license and distribute their source code under the GPL, iMatix Corporation provides an OEM Commercial License. Please contact us at sales at iMatix dot com for an OEM Commercial License.
Frequently-Asked Questions ==========================
- When do I need an OEM license?
You need an OEM license to distribute proprietary products based on the OpenAMQ source code. You do not need an OEM license to use the OpenAMQ client libraries and the OpenAMQ server in your applications.
- How much does an OEM license cost?
Please send an email to sales at iMatix dot com, with a description of your OEM product plan or proposal.
- Is the free OpenAMQ software complete?
Some functionality developed for OEM customer may not be included in the free OpenAMQ software version. However we strive to make OpenAMQ the most complete open source AMQP solution possible.
